entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:49 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 02:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
